text: Metal Hurlant is the eighth studio album by the band Misanthrope. It is a double full-length album, with the second incorporating some instrumental and English versions of songs from the firstBand's Website Métal Hurlant on AllMusic.Métal Hurlant on Metal Archives ==Track listing== Disque 1 Disque 2 ==References== Category:Misanthrope (band) albums Category:2005 albums
title: Metal Hurlant (album)
